resources.string: Scan engine is idle. Pick one-time or active mode.
One-time scan completed on this device.
Urgent actions: no immediate blockers detected.
No recent scan snapshot is available yet.
Root posture is elevated and needs hardening review.
Root posture is compromised; high-risk controls are restricted.
Wi-Fi posture is high risk and needs immediate network hardening.
Wi-Fi posture is elevated; verify encryption and network trust.
No Wi-Fi posture scan is available yet.
Device locator provider list is empty.
No device locator provider link can be launched on this device.
Primary account is not linked for faster locator recovery guidance.
Device locator is available through web fallback only.
Upgrade unlocks continuous monitoring, advanced triage volume, and connected AI support depth.
All high-priority controls look stable. Keep running periodic scans.
Continuous mode is blocked while root tier is compromised. Resolve: %1$s
Overlay assistant is blocked while root tier is compromised. Resolve: %1$s
Clipboard copy is blocked while root tier is compromised to reduce credential leakage risk.
Trial ended. No plan selected yet.
Trial ended. Preferred plan saved: %1$s. Purchase verification is still pending.
Pro Lifetime active on this device (%1$s).
This device is already Pro Lifetime (%1$s). Billing plan selection is not required.
Competitor avg: %1$s/month. DT target (15%% lower): %2$s/month. Weekly: %3$s. Yearly (12 for 10): %4$s/year.
Referral discount active: %1$s off. Monthly adjusted from %2$s to %3$s.
Share recommendation to unlock referral discount (%1$s off recurring plans).
Pro Lifetime is active on this device, so referral pricing is not required.
Next payment due: trial ends on %1$s
Next payment due: no active billing plan
Performance rating and recommendation not submitted yet.
Upgrade reason: Pro Lifetime active. Continuous protection and root-aware hardening are already unlocked.
Upgrade reason: trial includes full protection now. Convert to keep continuous protection, scam shield depth, and connected AI coverage.
Upgrade reason: paid protection is active. Keep guardian reports and root-aware hardening current by staying on plan.
Upgrade reason: upgrade unlocks continuous protection, root-aware hardening depth, scam shield triage volume, and connected AI copilot.
Billing is completed via official store channels. Save your preferred plan, then continue in billing. Official Play Store installs receive future updates through the store update chain.
This profile cannot manage billing plans. Parent or guardian profile controls family plan changes and opt-out.
Profile role: %1$s (billing and guardian feed managed by parent)
Profile role: %1$s (family umbrella active; billing managed by parent)
Graduation: 18+ role active. Account remains under family umbrella; parent controls plan opt-out.
Family billing is one flat monthly price regardless of child age band.
Plan preference saved locally: %1$s. Purchase verification will refresh next.
Refreshing purchase ownership from Play Billing...
Could not refresh purchase ownership right now. Try again from a stable network.
Purchase ownership refreshed: Pro Lifetime is active on this device.
Purchase ownership refreshed: verified %1$s plan is active.
Purchase ownership refreshed: no active paid purchase found for this device account.
How do you rate DT Guardian performance on this device?
Would you recommend this app to your friends?
Feedback saved: performance %1$d/5. Referral discount unlocked (%2$s off).
Feedback saved: performance %1$d/5. This device is already Pro Lifetime.
Feedback synced to support (%1$d sent, %2$d queued).
Feedback synced to support. Ticket created: %1$s.
Feedback saved locally. Support sync pending (%1$d queued).
Support sync: %1$d pending feedback item(s) delivered.
Support sync partial: %1$d delivered, %2$d still queued.
Continuous scan is a paid feature
Free users can run one-time scans. Start a trial or paid plan to unlock active continuous monitoring.
Breach monitoring is limited on free tier. Upgrade for higher or unlimited daily scans.
Overlay assistant is a paid feature
Overlay-guided password rotation is available during trial and paid plans.
Advanced queue automation is limited on free tier. Upgrade to expand queue capacity.
Free tier queue limit is %1$d pending actions. Upgrade to expand this limit.
Free tier stores up to %1$d credential records. Upgrade for expanded capacity.
Daily breach scan limit reached (%1$d/day) for %2$s tier.
Run hygiene audit to generate safe remediation actions.
This removes outdated local logs older than retention policy, trims stale completed queue actions, and clears app cache. Continue?
Safe cleanup complete: cache %1$s, artifacts %2$s (%3$d file(s)), queue trimmed %4$d.
Safe cleanup completed. No removable hygiene residue was found.
Your language pack is fully supported for the current app surface.
Core screens are localized. Some advanced dialogs may still appear in English.
This locale uses guided English fallback. Switch app language or report missing translations.
Translation feedback queued for support triage.
No open or in-progress incidents to resolve.
No urgent anti-phishing actions right now.
Run triage to generate phishing remediation guidance.
No anti-phishing triage has been recorded yet.
Paste URL or suspicious text for local triage.
Runs local heuristics only. No raw text is sent to external services.
Anti-phishing triage is disabled by policy.
No guardian alerts have been recorded yet.
Guardian feed is available on the parent profile only.
No Wi-Fi posture scan has been recorded yet.
Run Wi-Fi posture scan to generate findings.
Grant nearby Wi-Fi and location permissions to enable full posture checks.
Wi-Fi posture scan needs permission and location enabled.
Wi-Fi posture module is disabled by policy.
Device locator links are disabled by policy.
Add provider links in workspace settings to enable quick launch.
Unable to open configured locator provider link.
Unable to open provider setup link.
Link your primary email first for faster account recovery flows.
Open %1$s now and verify your device appears in provider controls.
Mode: connected profile linked, session key required.
Mode: AI hotline feature is locked for current tier.
Mode: connected AI is blocked by workspace policy.
Run refresh to generate local next-best actions.
AI copilot playbook refreshed from local scan context.
Connected AI copilot refreshed through policy broker.
Link your own API-backed AI subscription for expanded guidance. The app enforces route allowlists and cannot alter core APK structures.
Enter an API key to continue.
This removes the connected AI link and clears the active session key from memory.
Connected AI unlinked. Copilot remains in local-first mode.
Connected AI suggested \"%1$s\". Confirm to continue under policy-safe execution.
Current age protocol requires guardian approval before \"%1$s\".\nGuardian: %2$s
Connected AI copilot is available on trial/paid family-eligible tiers with AI hotline access.
No update check has run yet.
Release notes are not provided in the update manifest.
Created by Danicous Technologies. Lionhead identity and D_T defensive workflows integrated for local-first security.
Lion asset selection is available on paid plans.
Single source for app configuration. Tap an option to change it.
Single source of truth for appearance, lion identity, and core APK configuration entry points.
Guardian settings are synchronized with current app preferences.
Persistent preview updates in real time as you change shades, tone, and lion behavior.
Open the protected configuration flows for billing, connected AI, language, locator, and credentials.
Thank you for choosing DT Guardian, your all-in-one AI-powered security companion. Lion-powered and ready to protect with pride.
Analyzing the fastest next protection step.
Run a full sweep first. This refreshes score, Wi-Fi posture, and device watchdog checks.
Open Threats and clear suspicious items first to reduce active risk quickly.
Open Credentials next to fix pending password and account security actions.
Open Services for support actions, plan controls, and unresolved service prompts.

Start here:
%1$s

%2$s

Use the large buttons below to jump directly to the right screen.
Continuous local scanning is running on this device.
Set identity once, link your primary email, run password sweep, and manage service password actions in guided popups.
Ready for autofill-assisted passkey flows. Keep device lock + autofill provider active.
Enable autofill provider and password manager to prepare passkey sign-in flows.
Unable to open device settings for this action.
Access tier: %1$s | Records: %2$s | Queue pending: %3$s | Breach scans/day: %4$s
18+ graduation active: this profile is now single-user under the family umbrella.
Add a primary email to enable linked sweep.
Primary email saved. Tap Link primary email to verify sign-in.
Open a focused popup to keep current password, copy + change, or queue rotation.
Select a service action to load current credential status.
Add an identity label, optional primary email, and preferred 2FA route. You can edit this later.
Child birth year (required for child profile)
Guardian email is required for child profile.
Birth year is required for child profile.

Confirm action: %1$s
Use route: %2$s
%3$s

Tap confirm once verified.
Guardian check required for this age protocol. Confirm with: %1$s
Owner confirmation is active for this profile.
No stored accounts matched your primary email.
No breach scan has run in this session.
Action needed: one or more current passwords appear in breach data. Rotate now.
Primary email is linked. Run a password sweep now to detect breached credentials.
I changed it, set new as current
Stored current password copied to clipboard.
No stored current password found for this account.
Queued next password copied to clipboard.
No queued next password found for this account.
Rotation confirmed. New password is now current.
No queued next password to confirm.
No previous password is stored for this account.
Enter service + username to load stored credential history.
No stored credential yet for this service/username.
Generate a new password before queuing rotation.
Set a next password (manual or generated) before queuing rotation.
Service, username, and URL are required.
This account already has a queued rotation action.
Queued: %1$d | Pending: %2$d | Overdue: %3$d | Completed: %4$d | View: %5$s | Owner: %6$s
Use while changing account passwords in other apps.
Allow display over other apps to use the overlay assistant.
Overlay assistant is disabled for child profile.
Copying stored passwords is disabled for child profile.
Open %1$s sign-in now and link it to this app?
Opening provider sign-in. Return to confirm linking.
Unable to open provider sign-in URL.
Biometric or device credential is required.
Biometric authentication is unavailable on this device.
No unlock method is available. Configure app lock settings first.
Create a local PIN fallback (4-10 digits) for app access.
Confirm your local app PIN. Attempts remaining: %1$d
PIN attempts exhausted. App access is locked.
Add files/photos to secure vault, then open to manage secure-open/export/delete.
Media vault is disabled by workspace policy.
Unlock the app to access media vault actions.
Deleted items can be restored for %1$d day(s).
Unable to import this item to vault.
Free tier vault limit reached (%1$d items). Upgrade or delete old items to continue.
No items in vault yet. Use Add to vault first.
No compatible app found to view this secure item.
This item will be hidden and kept for %1$d day(s) before purge.
Vault item moved to deleted state.
This permanently removes encrypted data and cannot be undone.
Vault action unavailable for this item.
Action: %1$s\nGuardian confirmation is required for this profile.\nGuardian contact: %2$s
Set a guardian email in identity profile before running sensitive child-profile actions.
